reviews.review_msg: great prof! very nice and helpful... this is a prof who actually cares, has tons of office hours and always willing to help. marking was fair, labs were easy, lectures were kind of boring.

Lecture - nothing special; Lab - Pretty good. The TAs/prof don't mark for lab results, so even if you screw up you won't be penalized. Prof - Very approachable and helpful. Recommendation: Take the course with this prof whenever you get the chance.
Alright guy, SUPER boring.  Fair tests and a NICE guy just REALLY REALLY boring.
Exams are fair and straightforward...... the questions are directly from his lecture notes, so as long as you study his notes hard, you should be fine.

Highly recommend for 308! He is insanely smart and people often find that he doesn't teach well, but if you do a bit of work to meet him near his level and ask intelligent questions- he will provide. You absolutely need to prepare for lab as he values efficiency and concision in practice and in lab reports as well.

If you want to learn, he will provide.  Smart guy (who knows it) who explains things well, tries to convey the important basics to students.  If you can disregard his attitude, he's pretty good.  Grew on me over the semester.. no part marks on exams, so know your details

He is one of the best people I have ever met! He is supremely smart, kind, helpful and nice! The problem is that he might not teach the best sometimes, so you have to do alot of the work urself! The labs are too long sometimes, and the marking might not be the best!
He's a great guy. Seems to know a lot and is pretty funny. Labs are ridiculously long sometimes though. The marking is tough so you better know your stuff.

He is a bad teacher. he is a nice guy, but the labs are long and tedious, he expects people to know things that are irrelevant, and he doesnt even bother to teach them. he lectures cover nothing of value. avoid if possible

Not sure what the people under me are on, but he's not a great teacher. Nice guy, good sense of humour, but he doesn't teach. He just expects you to know things. And the labs are insanely long. A 4 hour lab section almost routinely takes 5 and a half hours to complete. He also makes random analogies that aren't related to anything you asked him for
Very helpful,crustal clear,enthusiastic, one of my best profs ever

He likes everything short, that includes 1+hr final exam and <10pgs lab reports. Very nice and helpful with a great team of TAs. He does have an interesting sense of humour and semi-hard to read writing but thats fine. Dont get the text, its not needed. Study everything that he provides for exams. He is way better than the other profs for 308.

Great prof. Changed MBB308 by adding a lot more content and claimed it as giving us more "bang for our buck". A bit technical sometimes and overly-wordy but extremely helpful and approachable! It's scary how smart this guy is + he's funny! Take 308 with him if you can
best prof i've had at sfu. makes you realize what it takes to be a good scientist. .... now i am in business. and he's funny
